text: The Sapito Rugoso Del Marahuaka (Metaphryniscus sosae) is a species of toad in the Bufonidae family. It is the only species in the genus Metaphryniscus. It lives in Venezuela. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== * La Marca, E. & Se√±aris, C. 2004. Metaphryniscus sosae. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 July 2007. Category:Toads Category:Frogs of South America
title: Sapito Rugoso Del Marahuaka
